elementary OS Tips & Tricks

  • Flash Plugin

    Sep 27, 2014

    • Before you can install Freshplayer you must have pepperflash plugin installed. Open you terminal and paste the command. Note if you are using chrome then there is no need for Freshplayer. Chrome has its own flash plugin built in. This is only needed if you are using firefox.

    Read More »

  • Double Chrome Icon Fix

    Sep 25, 2014

    • After installing Chrome on a fresh install of elementary OS Freya you might notice that after opening chrome you get two icons. To fix this you have to input one simple line in the terminal.

    Read More »

  • Installing Dropbox

    Sep 24, 2014

    • Before you can actually install Dropbox to your system you first have to install the plugin for the office environment pantheon. If you are on Luna you will get an icon on the top right of the wing-panel. Currently the icon does not appear on Freya.

    Read More »
